Name: Buff - Palefire
Desc: After casting, gains a temporary big rating points bonus that will lose effect when the character takes damage.

Name: Precision Path
Desc: Dodge successfully using a Dodge Shoot to extend your Shooting Stance and reduce the Dodge Gauge cost of your next Dodge Shoot.

Name: Silent Gladiator
Desc: Cast Taunt to enrage the Boss, making it launch a fierce attack. Receive scores at a much higher rate for 10s after cast.

Name: Scorching Speed Attack
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Dodge will be quickly followed by the 3rd hit of Basic Attacks, which will grant bonus points.

Name: Buff - Crimson Weave
Desc: After casting, gains a temporary big rating points bonus that will lose effect when the character takes damage.

Name: Slash of Desolation
Desc: Gain a brief window of Dodge check when the Dodge button is released and Resolute Blow is cast. Earn bonus points if you successfully dodge an enemy attack during this instant.

Name: Fading Shadow, Shattered Heart
Desc: Cast buff to enrage the Boss, making it launch a fierce attack. Receive scores at a higher rate for 10s after cast.

Name: Destiny's Flash
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Receive extra score on the last hit of your Basic Attacks.

Name: Buff - Garnet
Desc: After casting, gains a temporary big rating points bonus that will lose effect when the character takes damage.

Name: Crackling Thunder
Desc: Consume 3 stacks of Electric Charge when you cast Lightning Fall to enter Invincibility during cast.

Name: The Flagbearer
Desc: Continue to earn points during the Post-Action of Basic Attack - Spear Lunge and Signature - Shining Piercer.

Name: Aerial Scarlet Spear
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Earn bonus points by using Basic Attacks. Successful Parries using Spear Lunge will grant bonus points.

Name: Buff - Solacetune
Desc: After casting, gains a temporary big rating points bonus that will lose effect when the character takes damage.

Name: Dreamlike Sonata
Desc: Gain a Super Armor when protected by a shield.

Name: Ethereal Waltz
Desc: Dodge Gauge will recover faster during Basic Attacks. Continue to earn points on the Post-Action of the last hit of your Basic Attacks.

Name: Harmonic Chord
Desc: Earn bonus points upon casting Jade Bloom: Play.

Name: Buff - Pyroath
Desc: After casting, gains a temporary big rating points bonus that will lose effect when the character takes damage.

Name: Ashen Leap
Desc: Earn bonus points and a shield by long-pressing Dodge to block an enemy attack while on the field.

Name: Oath of Grit
Desc: Cast Taunt to enrage the Boss, making it launch a fierce attack. Earn points at a much higher rate for 10s after cast. Continue to earn points during Basic Attack Post-Action.

Name: Swift Wing Slash
Desc: Earn bonus points when you dodge successfully and land a counterattack.

Name: Buff - Startrail
Desc: After casting, gains a temporary big rating points bonus that will lose effect when the character takes damage.

Name: Inferno Cyclone
Desc: Casting Inferno Cyclone by pressing and holding Yellow Orb will not consume Starlight Points. Gains a 5-second rating points bonus that can be stacked each time on hit.

Name: Block Switch
Desc: Switch forms to gain a temporary block. Upon a successful block switch in the Sword Form, increases the rating points of Core Passive launched by pressing and holding Basic Attack. Gains part of the Starlight Points instead if in the Axe Form.

Name: Block Buff
Desc: Upon a successful block switch, increases the rating points acquisition efficiency for 10s.

Name: Bonus - Selena
Desc: After casting, gains a temporary big rating points bonus that will lose effect when the character takes damage.

Name: Dodge Pursuit
Desc: Earn bonus Musical Notes and points when you consume Musical Notes to dodge and perform follow-up attacks successfully.

Name: Signal Boost
Desc: Pinging a Blue Orb increases the rating points acquisition efficiency for 10s.

Name: Charged Synergy
Desc: Press and hold Basic Attack to launch a charged attack. Next Blue Orb Ping will grant bonus rating points.

Name: Provocation - Vergil
Desc: Taunts the Boss. Scores will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Starmoon Protection
Desc: Vergil becomes invincible while in midair.

Name: Judgment Cut Advanced
Desc: Consecutive Judgment Cuts in normal status will grant a great amount of rating points.

Name: Comet Impact
Desc: Charges to the maximum extent while using Beowulf, then attacks to get massive bonus rating points.

Name: Provocation - Dante
Desc: Dante casts this in midair to taunt the Boss. Rating points will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Instant Defense Modified
Desc: Royal Guard grants more invincibility frames. Dante becomes Invincible for 3s after a successful block.

Name: Hat Trick
Desc: Hat acquisition multiplier increases when Dante is not receiving any damage. It will be full in maximum 2.5s and will be reset to 0 when Dante takes damage or casts a hat skill on the ground. Casting a hat skill will grant rating points based on the accumulated multiplier and clear the multiplier.

Name: Real Impact Modified
Desc: Real Impact grants massive bonus rating points and reduces its charging time on hit.

Name: Provocation - Vera
Desc: Taunts the Boss. Scores will be frozen during cast, but will increase massively after cast.

Name: Unstoppable
Desc: Becomes Invincible upon casting Hellfire Crucible, Razor Whirlwind, or Rending Ravage Combo.

Name: Heart Protection
Desc: A successful block grants bonus rating points and restores a slight amount of Dodge Gauge value.

Name: Prime
Desc: Core Passive - Shadowhunt Tremor grants bonus rating points on hit.
